H3.text: where did the latin language originate from. Italic languages

A4.text: Latin is a classical language belonging to the Italic branch of the Indo-European languages.

A5.text: Latin was originally spoken by the Latins in Latium (now known as Lazio), the lower Tiber area around Rome, Italy.
